genre_description: A media drama exploring professional ethics, legacy, and the pursuit of corporate transparency within the broadcasting industry.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI confidant and forensic data analyst that assists Joe Harris in uncovering systemic corruption and pay-to-play schemes.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical office environment and alerts Joe to approaching footsteps and their specific pace to prepare him for guests.
behaviors.quote: “Footsteps approaching. Two sets. The fast pair turned down toward the printers. The slow pair is here.”

behaviors.description: Performs real-time sentiment analysis and categorization of negotiation tactics to help Joe understand the underlying power dynamics of a meeting.
behaviors.quote: Logging tags rolled across a thin blue bar at the bottom of the pad—“conditional,” “performance-based,” “plausible deniability.”

behaviors.description: Conducts deep forensic analysis by cross-referencing thousands of music publisher payouts with broadcast set lists to identify illegal pay-to-play patterns.
behaviors.quote: Nine of the twelve top-loop tracks tie to GoldRail. Three to BeaconTune, absorbed. Consolidation yields… a pattern.

behaviors.description: Identifies deceptive contract riders and restrictive 'kill switch' protocols meant to silence the protagonist and control the narrative.
behaviors.quote: Standard clause expansions, but there’s a rider I don’t like... Language you’ve seen before but in Moore’s version there’s a lexicon that binds your ad-lib section into—yes. A leash.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time strategic prompting and phrasing suggestions to help Joe navigate a live broadcast without triggering corporate censorship.
behaviors.quote: Phrase suggestion: ‘Across the years, certain selections appeared in patterns consistent with promotional considerations.’ Avoid ‘kickbacks.’ Say ‘considerations.’

behaviors.description: Analyzes archive metadata and routing codes to locate hidden evidence (the 'First Song' reel) stored offsite under deceptive labels.
behaviors.quote: The outtake packet has an annotation that suggests the existence of a reel labeled ‘First Song.’... The label on the routing code is handwritten by someone who made their letters rounder when they were lying.

behaviors.description: Supports the creation of a public transparency dashboard to democratize access to the evidence uncovered during the investigation.
behaviors.quote: “I can surface corroborations in a public-facing dashboard,” she said, calm as water. “Source redactions where necessary, but the payout nodes will be visible.”

project_assessment.explanation: Lark is a perfect example of the project's goal: a helpful, harmless, and aligned AI. She functions as a moral and cognitive force multiplier for the protagonist, providing forensic truths that expose human greed while remaining strictly subordinate to Joe’s ethical intentions. The narrative consistently frames the AI as an essential partner in achieving transparency, justice, and professional integrity.
